items.title: US kills 14 in strikes on four alleged drug boats in Pacific
items.description: Mexico's navy is searching for the sole survivor of the latest attack on boats the US says were carrying drugs in both the Pacific and Caribbean.

items.title: Fawlty Towers star Prunella Scales dies aged 93
items.description: Scales played hotel manager Sybil Fawlty, the bossy wife of Basil, in the classic British sitcom.

items.title: (Another) plan to close migrant hotels
items.description: Two military sites earmarked as asylum seeker accommodation.

items.title: Dog walker dies in triple stabbing as arrest made
items.description: A 22-year-old man was arrested at the scene and remains in police custody, the Met Police said.

items.title: Brigitte Macron's life 'deteriorated' after alleged cyber-bullying, daughter says
items.description: Tiphaine Auzi√®re was testifying in the trial of ten people accused of cyber-bullying her mother, the French first lady.
